title: Front-End.
body: Give your visitors the best expression on your site with good looking design, eye-catching animation and responsiveness using HTML, CSS, JS or React

title: Scripting
body: Make your site more dynamic and user friendly, using clean cross-browser and valid code.

title: Bug-fixes
body: Get rid of all the bugs that make you feel bad and your site ugly. Leave me those easy-peasy tasks and grow your business on the fly.
